title: Fix mining functionality, improve admin panel, and fix withdrawal system

requirements.text: Fix the mining start button functionality to properly initiate mining tasks when clicked, ensuring the task is created in the backend and the UI updates to reflect the active mining status

quotes: start mining ko click kare to mining start hogiy

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the start mining button successfully creates a mining task in the backend
The UI immediately updates to show the mining task is active
The mining progress bar displays correctly after starting
No errors occur during the mining task creation process

requirements.text: Remove the 7-day mining duration option from the mining panel, keeping only 1-5 day duration options available for selection
acceptanceCriteria: Mining panel only shows duration options from 1 to 5 days
No 7-day option is visible or selectable in the UI
All remaining duration options (1-5 days) function correctly

requirements.text: Improve the admin panel implementation to ensure all withdrawal approval/rejection actions work reliably, with proper error handling and success feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can successfully approve withdrawal requests and the status updates correctly
Admin can successfully reject withdrawal requests with proper status updates
Clear success or error messages appear after each action
The withdrawal queue refreshes automatically after approve/reject actions
All admin controls are clearly visible and functional

requirements.text: Fix the withdrawal system to ensure withdrawal requests are properly created, processed, and displayed with correct status updates throughout the approval workflow
acceptanceCriteria: Users can successfully submit withdrawal requests with valid TRC20 addresses
Withdrawal requests appear in both user withdrawal history and admin queue
Withdrawal status updates correctly when approved or rejected by admin
User balance is properly deducted when withdrawal is approved
Error messages display clearly when withdrawals fail validation

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Keep the existing TRC20 withdrawal system with 20 USDT minimum
Preserve the 2 USDT per day earnings calculation
Maintain the existing Telegram bonus system
nonGoals: Adding new mining duration options beyond 1-5 days
